thread.title: Larry Edelman

author: Larry Edelman
title: Larry Edelman
text: Couldn't be happier with the product and customer service received from Greatmats. Beth was helpful in deciding between options for putting gym flooring over a large carpeted area in my basement. The flooring looks and feels great and is supporting a heavy treadmill and equipment without any sagging or splitting between tiles. Very satisfied customer!
